projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: Here are some of the projects I've worked on.

booksApp.title: Books App
booksApp.description: This project was part of a 6-week internship with Chingu.io. I worked with a team of 4 people on a project built with Vite for the frontend and Express on the backend. Authentication was implemented with Passport.js, and I practiced teamwork and Agile methodology.

posSystem.title: POS System App
posSystem.description: A Full-Stack POS System for businesses to manage multiple customers simultaneously. The backend uses NestJS with JWT authentication and authorization, while the frontend is built with Vite and React Router v6 to strengthen my skills in NestJS and React.

linktree.title: hi-x.net LinkTree
linktree.description: A client project where I fixed layout issues, improved structure to follow industry standards, optimized performance by replacing Font Awesome with SVGs, applied lazy loading, and made the site fully responsive.

devChallenges.title: DevChallenges Frontend Projects Collection
devChallenges.description: A collection of front-end challenges from DevChallenges.io, focused on responsive design, accessibility, and performance. Each project uses semantic HTML, CSS Grid/Flexbox, and optimized images for speed and consistency.

selfTracker.title: SelfTracker Fitness App
selfTracker.description: A React Native mobile app for Android and iOS to track weight and workout logs with a calendar view, charts, and task management — designed to improve lifestyle and personal progress tracking.

about.title: About Me
about.name: Ahmed Lotfy
about.description1: Hello, I'm Ahmed Lotfy, a Full-Stack Web & Mobile Software Developer with a background in PC maintenance. My journey into software development is driven by a passion for technology and continuous learning.
about.description2: My experience in hardware gives me a unique perspective on software development, allowing me to approach problems with a holistic mindset.
about.description3: I am actively seeking opportunities to contribute to innovative projects. If you're looking for a dedicated Full-Stack developer, I’d love to connect with you.
